instructions.0: To enable https on front (nginx server) you must to do:
instructions.1: Copy the file index.html from the folder animal-care-foundation/public/assets/index_https
instructions.2: Paste the file index.html to the folder animal-care-foundation/public
instructions.3: The key is this: <meta http-equiv='Content-Security-Policy' content='upgrade-insecure-requests'>
instructions.4: With the before key line, the front require https
instructions.5: Without the before key line, the front doesn't require https and run in http
